001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.spi.SecretsProvider;
005import jakarta.inject.Inject;
006import org.glassfish.hk2.api.IterableProvider;
007import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.ContractsProvided;
008import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
009
010@Service(name="secrets")
011@ContractsProvided(Secrets.class)
012public class SecretsHK2
013    extends Secrets
014{
015    @Inject
016    public SecretsHK2(IterableProvider<SecretsProvider> providers, Configuration configuration) {
017        super(name -> providers.named(name).get(), configuration.getString("secrets.default").orElse("env"));
018    }
019}
